programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Ang Sa Iyo Ay Akin
programme.desc: Marissa and Ellice are best friends who hail from different worlds: Ellice is from an influential family, while Marissa is a simple lass living with her mother Lucing. The two are inseparable until one night, a gruesome crime changes their destinies.

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba
programme.desc: Two strangers' lives become entwined after they both return from apparent death due to a road crash.

programme.title: She's Dating The Gangster
programme.desc: It all started when 17-year-old Athena Dizon unwittingly plays a trick on resident bad boy Kenji de los Reyes. All of a sudden, she finds herself pretending to be his girlfriend to make his ex jealous. Has Athena gotten herself into more trouble than she can handle?

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Kapamilya Daily Mass
programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 5
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 21
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 4
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 1
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 1

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 12
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 4
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Barrio Kulimlim ep 5
programme.desc: Family and fate intertwine in this dark story of old rituals and a parallel shadow universe where sacrifices of blood ensures that the small town of Quatro Santo remains wealthy and prosperous. programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 35
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 115
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 35
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 115
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 1
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 35
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 115
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 5
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: For the Love ep 2
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 5
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Kimmy Dora and the Temple Of Kiyeme

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe Ng Buhay Ko
Ang Pinakamagandang Hayop Sa Balat Ng Lupa
All
programme.desc: GMA's weekend musical comedy variety show that showcases a fun musical experience.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Global Pinoy Unlimited
programme.desc: Global Pinoy Unlimited features community news, Pinoy headliners and their significant contributions to the community, as well as special kababayan and Kapuso happenings across the globe.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Stars On The Floor
programme.desc: The program is set to bring together the biggest names from TV and the digital world, all paired up for the country's biggest dance-collab competition.

programme.title: The Voice Kids
programme.desc: A spin-off of the biggest singing competition, “The Voice”. The series features coaches searching for a batch of talented new kids, who could become the Philippines' new child singing superstar.

programme.title: All
programme.desc: GMA's weekend musical comedy variety show that showcases a fun musical experience.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'Patayin Si Mediavillo'
programme.desc: Police officer Mediavillo finds himself pursued by multiple assassins instigated by a prominent businessman, who happens to be the brother of the drug dealer accidentally died on the hand of Mediavillo.

programme.title: Stars On The Floor
programme.desc: The program is set to bring together the biggest names from TV and the digital world, all paired up for the country's biggest dance-collab competition.

programme.title: The Voice Kids
programme.desc: A spin-off of the biggest singing competition, “The Voice”. The series features coaches searching for a batch of talented new kids, who could become the Philippines' new child singing superstar.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Stars On The Floor
programme.desc: The program is set to bring together the biggest names from TV and the digital world, all paired up for the country's biggest dance-collab competition.

programme.title: The Voice Kids
programme.desc: A spin-off of the biggest singing competition, “The Voice”. The series features coaches searching for a batch of talented new kids, who could become the Philippines' new child singing superstar.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: An upcoming family-oriented drama series starring Carmina Villaroel, Cassy Legaspi, Mavy Legaspi, Zoren Legaspi .

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe Ng Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Andrew E and his gang rescued the damsels in distress from a robbery accident. He gave them food and lodging in his humble home, hopeful that someday, Charlene, one of the girls he rescued, would learn to love him.

programme.title: Blue Jeans Gang
programme.desc: Brian (Keempee de Leon), Alan (Gary Estrada), Jerry (Kier Legaspi), Tom (Joko Diaz), Jojo(Michael Rivero), and Pat (Dennis Padilla) call themselves the BLUE JEANS GANG. They consider themselves to be more like brothers than friends.

programme.title: Codename: Palaban
programme.desc: Coming from different social backgrounds and of different ideologies, this group of women are made to undergo special training course in exchange for suspended jail sentences.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as \"bad boy\" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Teacher... Teacher, I Love You
programme.desc: Raul Portugis is a Physics professor from Cebu who had relocated to Manila and became a witness to a crime. This, plus the experience of handling a difficult class and being a newcomer in the big city, results in one of Redford White's funniest films.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas
programme.desc: Heiress Anjanette Abayari, who had just arrived from the US, was abducted by rebels while on her way home to see her father. Experienced tracker Cesar Montano, who was serving time in jail, was released to find her in exchange for his freedom.

programme.title: Abot Hanggang Sukdulan
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of the eldest daughter shattered the once happy Paredes household. They vowed to get justice for their daughter but changed their plan when Romano offered marriage after it was discovered that Agnes was pregnant.

programme.title: Kapag Puso'y Sinugatan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Hilda Koronel portrayed a fiercely independent woman who refused to be married to Christopher de Leon, who raped her and got her pregnant.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Sana'y Wala Nang Wakas (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three women united by friendship, music and fame. But much that celebrity brought them good things, it too, began to destroy them.

programme.title: Ang Probinsyano
programme.desc: FPJ is an honest policeman from the province who has just been transferred to the big city. He's being \"promdi\" makes him the butt of many humiliating jokes. Angered and challenged, he retaliates by working extra hard, and in the end proving that his being probinsyano is not the gauge to his true worth.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Huminga Ka Na Hangga't Gusto Mo
Jack \u0026 Jill (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Everything in this tale seemed like a strange mix-up and you will find more in this utterly hilarious remake of a Mars Ravelo komiks classic.

programme.title: She-Man, Mistress Of The Universe
programme.desc: Joey de Leon played the role of Pando, a kind-hearted country bumpkin with illusions of being a superhero. His fantasy came true when he was given powers by Gayskull to enable him to rescue the barrio kids who had been kidnapped by the men of Skeleton.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Pilya
programme.desc: Ditas has the body of a full-grown adult but her sense is that of a child. Although she exists in an environment where vulgarity is deemed normal, she maintains her wide-eyed innocence.

programme.title: Mistah
programme.desc: Real-life brothers Robin and Rustom Padilla topbilled this action epic about the Muslim conflict in the Southern part of the Philippines. Though diverse in outlook, they shared the belief that all Filipinos were brothers, whether they are Muslims or Christians, and hence, should not be at war with each other.

programme.title: Ang Pinakamagandang Hayop Sa Balat Ng Lupa 1
programme.desc: Gloria Diaz plays a strange but a beautiful woman who is washed ashore in an island where her presence causes intrigue, jealousy, strife and later on, even a series of deaths.

programme.title: Isa Lang Ang Dapat Mahalin
programme.desc: Vina Torres is a successful young lawyer with a happy family life. But things start to falter when her car hits Rex,ca criminal wanting to change for the better together with his dancer-girlfriend.

programme.title: Estudyante Blues
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, \"Anak\", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Simaron
programme.desc: As a martial arts expert, a graduate of the Police Academy of America and the son of a retired general, Cris could have had all the privileges possible for a career in the armed forces. However, like many of the heroes he had idolized since childhood, he chosed to go undercover.
